# Chocolatey CPCReady Package

Official Chocolatey package repository for CPCReady - Amstrad CPC development tool.

## About

This repository contains the Chocolatey package definition for installing CPCReady on Windows.

## Installation

```powershell
choco install cpc
```

## Links

- [Main Repository](https://github.com/CPCReady/cpc)
- [Chocolatey Package](https://community.chocolatey.org/packages/cpc)
- [Documentation](https://github.com/CPCReady/cpc#readme)
